Text: dont upload private files and passwords can be easily broken
this is private files and I must send my friends but it is too big.so I am trying to send with torrent but I don't seed this. why ?
It isnt breaking any rules stevo, hes told you it has a password

If you created a torrent that you just wanted to share with a few friends, why didn't you simply email the .torrent file to them, instead of posting it here on a public site for tens of millions of people to see?
Files of this size are to big to e-mail you need to use a free app like Pando which allows up to 1GB for free
